title: Women Without Shadows
brief_description: A series of interviews which try to establish the current role of the woman in the Saudi society in relation with the recent past.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

description: A series of interviews which try to establish the current role of the woman in the Saudi society in relation with the recent past.
